title: NPMJS - Packages
descriptions: Developed few packages for angularjs framework

title: Bower - file resolver
descriptions: File resolver to back a file system as bower respository

title: AngularJS - Flow router
descriptions: Wrapper for Angular Router to provide Page flow based design approach

title: One touch Monitoring Tool – Ninja
descriptions: Developed this product to graphically visualize the health status of various IT applications cross platforms and tech stacks.

title: Service Delivery Platform – Gatsby
descriptions: Web platform to manage for Effort/Task tracking, KEDB and pattern tracking.

title: Kabira – KPSA test automation
descriptions: Developed a testing framework which involved shell scripts and provtest of KPSA togather to test KPSA end to end provisioning flow at every stage and display the results as well to collect logs post the test.

title: Kabira – Cartridge test automation
descriptions: Developed a custom cartridge testing framework which can inject and test workorders in parallel and complete the testing within minutes.
This framework enabled a complete testing of cartridges and short span of development still maintaining the quality well beyond the expectation.

title: Kabira – Action language IDE
descriptions: Developed and used the vim plugin extensively to create a IDE for Kabira Action language.
It uses features like that of a rich editor like eclipse for syntax highlighting, autocomplete, auto format, auto template and building of components.
